alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:48PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches below 6,500 feet with 3 to 6 inches above 6,500 feet. * WHERE...West Central Plateau, West Central Mountains, West Central Highlands, Espanola Valley, Santa Fe Metro Area, Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Estancia Valley, Guadalupe County and Quay County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New Mexico can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, 1-800-432-4269, or visiting nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
